entry.title: $2150 // Close to transportation - s/s appliances- h/w floors - Avail: NOW
entry.content:
One (2) bedroom available in AAA, prime Astoria location

ACTUAL Rent, NO Gimmicks, NO Upsurging & NO Broker's Fee

Heat, hot water, and cooking gas included. BIG savings - approx. $150.00 per month

Rent directly from Management

Move in date: NOW - for immediate move in

Manhattan is 15 minutes via N Q W subway lines (100 feet from building)

Several bus lines are all within 1 block of building

Color video / audio intercom

Stainless steel appliances including microwave and dishwasher and granite countertop

Hardwood floors

Full-time live in Super

Laundry located in building for tenant's use

Supermarkets, shopping, cafes, organic markets, restaurants, etc. are within walking distance

Qualifications: Minimum annual income (40 X rent) and good / excellent credit report

NO PETS

No broker fee

Please call or text to schedule a private showing (24 hour notice is required as it is still tenant occupied)
